titles.title: Commending Korean and Korean-American veterans for their service to the United States during the Vietnam conflict.
Commending Korean and Korean-American veterans for their service to the United States during the Vietnam conflict.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: Commends Korean and Korean American veterans for their service to the United States during the Vietnam conflict.
